item.title:
RT by @SPOCMusic: Tomorrow, it'll be one week until the show on the 7th of July at St Pancras Old Church. Tix in the link! https://link.dice.fm/LqWchgDxfrb @SPOCMusic
Here I am in front of the @EatYourOwnEars billboard early this morning after a late-night Turkish meal. Excitable boy ‚ú®
